original_text: You people of Israel's family, listen to me! I led you through the wilderness for 40 years. During that time, did you worship me with sacrifices and offerings? No! You people of Israel's family, listen to me! I led you through the wilderness for 40 years. During that time, did you worship me with sacrifices and offerings? No! You people of Israel's family, listen to me! I led you through the wilderness for 40 years. During that time, did you worship me with sacrifices and offerings? No!
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속아 너희가 사십 년 동안 광야에서 희생과 소제물을 내게 드렸느냐

sentences.original_text: You people of Israel's family, listen to me!
I led you through the wilderness for 40 years.
During that time, did you worship me with sacrifices and offerings?
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동안 너희가 제물과 예물로 나를 섬겼느냐?
